data.text:
I began to watch Cheval Grand training, 
one day, some time later
data.processed:

data.text:
Remember well what you have learned in class, 
and run as fast as each of you can. 
Let's start with Team A. Please enter the gate
data.name: Instructor A

󠁿and run as fast as each of you can.

data.text:
Apparently, Cheval Grand was going to run. 
I headed to the audience seat, watching it for future reference
data.processed:
󠁿Apparently, Cheval Grand was going to run. 
󠁿I headed to the audience seat, watching it for future reference

data.text:
(Like in class, Race also makes me nervous. 
What if, I can't win it again this time)

data.processed:
󠁿(Like in class, Race also makes me nervous. 
󠁿What if, I can't win it again this time)

data.text: Eh...? Trainer?
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Eh...? Trainer?

data.text:
(Thats right, it's not like I'm nothing now. 
there's something I've been building up with Trainer)

󠁿(Thats right, it's not like I'm nothing now. 
󠁿there's something I've been building up with Trainer)

data.text: Hngh...., don't waste this! Get fired up! and come on!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Hngh...., don't waste this! Get fired up! and come on!

data.text: Soon, the race was on
data.processed: 󠁿Soon, the race was on

data.text:
(The start dash went well! 
Keep up the position while following Kita-san back!)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(The start dash went well! 
󠁿Keep up the position while following Kita-san back!)

data.text:
(Slowly following her in the last straight line, 
and then drove it in at the last minute!)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(Slowly following her in the last straight line, 
󠁿and then drove it in at the last minute!)

data.text:
The pack eventually entered the final straight line. 
In the lead was Kitasan Black 
Cheval Grand is right behind her

data.name: Cheval Grand

data.text:
(I-I hate myself. I'm weak and gloomy, and on top of that, 
I can't get any result 
I don't believe in myself at all, but...)

data.text:
Yes!, Kitasan Black here! My goal is to be like Tokai Teio! 
to become a strong and shiny Horse girl!

But... Ahaha! that was fun! 
You are amazing Cheval Grand!

Hey Cheval-chan, what is your dream?

Uh....

data.text:
Phew..., a sigh escapes me. 
even thought its only a race in the middle of class 
It was an incredibly heated competition.

data.text: (You gave me something I was missing)

data.processed: 󠁿(You gave me something I was missing)

data.text: (Something I just couldn't fill in, by myself)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿(Something I just couldn't fill in, by myself)

data.text: Be courageous, Cheval Grand!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Be courageous, Cheval Grand!

data.text: A stiff-faced Cheval Grand visited the Trainer's office.
data.processed: 󠁿A stiff-faced Cheval Grand visited the Trainer's office.

data.text: Um! Excuse me! Can i have a moment, please?...!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Um! Excuse me! Can i have a moment, please?...!

data.text:
I'm really, no-not much of a Horse girl, 
I'm plain, gloomy, I get fat easily, I'm not sparkling at all
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿I'm really, no-not much of a Horse girl,

data.text:
But.... still, I really want to...

󠁿But.... still, I really want to...

data.text:
Uhhh. 
Grea-

󠁿Grea-

data.text: Greatest Horse girl, I WANT TO BECOME THAT!

Cheval Grand eye, which do not easily look at me, 
She looked straight at me, as if hoping 
as she was challenging me

data.text:
Ah, I feel like I can get there with you 
So, please come with me...!

󠁿Ah, I feel like I can get there with you 
󠁿So, please come with me...!

data.text:
Oh......no, I mean! I'm not asking you to come, 
Of course, If you don't mind is what i mean...!

data.processed:
󠁿Oh......no, I mean! I'm not asking you to come, 
󠁿Of course, If you don't mind is what i mean...!

data.text:
The race I just watched was fantastic. 
and even if I didn't, I already know a lot about her talent.

choices.text: Of course! Let's make our dream come true together!

Ah, Thank you very much! 
I, will do my best...!

data.text:
The tense expression on her face suddenly relaxed. 
A bright smile shone in the golden light shining through the window.
